languages.text: "Ксавьер, ты затеял нечто опасное и безумное. Остановись!"
"The line you are treading is a dangerous one, Calcazar. Stop this madness!"
languages.original_text: "Ксавьер, ты затеял нечто опасное и безумное. Остановись!"

traits.locale_text: "You are playing a very dangerous and crazy game, Xavier. Stop!"
"You are playing a very dangerous and crazy game, Xavier. Stop!"
"You're playing a very dangerous and crazy game, Xavier. Stop it!"
"You're playing a very dangerous and crazy game, Xavier. Stop it!"
"The game you are playing is a dangerous one, Calcazar. Stop this madness!"
"The line you are treading is a dangerous one, Calcazar. Stop this madness!"

languages.text: « Vous jouez avec le feu, Calcazar. Mettez un terme à cette folie ! »
languages.original_text: "The line you are treading is a dangerous one, Calcazar. Stop this madness!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous jouez avec le feu, Xavier. Mettez un terme à cette folie ! »

languages.text: «Camina por una línea muy peligrosa, Calcazar. ¡Ponga fin a esta locura!».
languages.original_text: "The line you are treading is a dangerous one, Calcazar. Stop this madness!"

traits.locale_text: «Está cometiendo un acto descabellado y muy peligroso, Xavier. ¡Deténgase!».

languages.text: “你踏上了相当危险的道路，卡尔卡扎。立刻停止这种疯狂行径！”
languages.original_text: "The line you are treading is a dangerous one, Calcazar. Stop this madness!"

traits.locale_text: “你这场游戏非常危险，非常疯狂，希维尔。快住手吧！”

languages.text: "Ihr befindet Euch auf gefährlichem Boden, Calcazar. Setzt diesem Wahnsinn ein Ende!"
languages.original_text: "The line you are treading is a dangerous one, Calcazar. Stop this madness!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr spielt ein sehr gefährliches und verrücktes Spiel, Xavier. Beendet es!"

languages.text: 「カルカサル、お前は危険な領域に足を踏み入れている。狂気から醒めろ！」
languages.original_text: "The line you are treading is a dangerous one, Calcazar. Stop this madness!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前がやっているのは、危険で狂った遊びだ。ザビエル、やめろ！」

languages.text: "Tehlikeli bir yolda yürüyorsun Calcazar. Yol yakınken deliliği bırak!"
languages.original_text: "The line you are treading is a dangerous one, Calcazar. Stop this madness!"
